ACCELERATED_GROWTH.effect: Target your DUA. When a two (or greater) health Treefolk unit is killed, you may instead exchange it with a one health Treefolk unit from your DUA. This effect lasts until the beginning of your next turn.
ACCELERATED_GROWTH.name: Accelerated Growth

ASH_STORM.effect: Target any terrain. Subtract one result from all army rolls at that terrain until the beginning of your next turn.
ASH_STORM.name: Ash Storm

BERSERKER_RAGE.effect: Target an army containing at least one Feral unit. All Feral units in the target army may count save results as if they were melee results during all counter-attacks, until the beginning of your next turn.
BERSERKER_RAGE.name: Berserker Rage

BLIZZARD.effect: Target any terrain. Subtract three melee results from all army rolls at that terrain until the beginning of your next turn.
BLIZZARD.name: Blizzard

DANCING_LIGHTS.effect: Target any opposing army. Subtract six melee results from the target's rolls until the beginning of your next turn.
DANCING_LIGHTS.name: Dancing Lights

DECAY.effect: Target any opposing army. Subtract two melee results from the target's rolls until the beginning of your next turn.
DECAY.name: Decay

DELUGE.effect: Target any terrain. Subtract three maneuver and three missile results from all army rolls at that terrain until the beginning of your next turn.
DELUGE.name: Deluge

ESFAHS_GIFT.effect: Target a minor terrain in your BUA. Move that terrain to your summoning pool.
ESFAHS_GIFT.name: Esfah's Gift

EVIL_EYE.effect: Target any opposing army. Subtract two save results from the target's rolls until the beginning of your next turn.
EVIL_EYE.name: Evil Eye

EVOLVE_DRAGONKIN.effect: Target one of your Dragonkin units that matches the element of magic used to cast this spell. The target is promoted one health-worth.
EVOLVE_DRAGONKIN.name: Evolve Dragonkin

EXHUME.effect: Target up to three health-worth of units in an opposing player's DUA. The targets make a save roll. If the targets do not generate a save result they are buried. You may return units, up to the health-worth of units buried in this way, to the casting army from your DUA.
EXHUME.name: Exhume

FEARFUL_FLAMES.effect: Target any opposing unit. Inflict one point of damage on the target. If the target unit saves against the damage, the target unit makes a second save roll. Unless the target unit gets a save result, the target unit flees to reserves.
FEARFUL_FLAMES.name: Fearful Flames

FIELDS_OF_ICE.effect: Target any terrain. Subtract four maneuver results from all army rolls at that terrain until the beginning of your next turn. Ties in maneuver rolls at that terrain are won by the counter-maneuvering army while the terrain is under the effect of Fields of Ice.
FIELDS_OF_ICE.name: Fields of Ice

FIERY_WEAPON.effect: Target any army. Add two melee or missile results to any roll the target makes until the beginning of your next turn.
FIERY_WEAPON.name: Fiery Weapon

FINGER_OF_DEATH.effect: Target any opposing unit. Inflict one point of damage on the target with no save possible.
FINGER_OF_DEATH.name: Finger of Death

FIREBOLT.effect: Target any opposing unit. Inflict one point of damage on the target.
FIREBOLT.name: Firebolt

FIRESTORM.effect: Target any terrain. Inflict two points of damage on each army at that terrain.
FIRESTORM.name: Firestorm

FLASHFIRE.effect: Target any army. During any non-maneuver army roll, the target's owner may re-roll any one unit in the target army once, ignoring the previous result. This effect lasts until the beginning of your next turn.
FLASHFIRE.name: Flashfire

FLASH_FLOOD.effect: Target any terrain. Reduce that terrain one step unless an opposing army at that terrain generates at least six maneuver results. A terrain may never be reduced by more than one step during a player's turn from the effects of Flash Flood.
FLASH_FLOOD.name: Flash Flood

HAILSTORM.effect: Target any opposing army. Inflict one point of damage on the target.
HAILSTORM.name: Hailstorm

HIGHER_GROUND.effect: Target any opposing army. Subtract five melee results from the target's rolls until the beginning of your next turn.
HIGHER_GROUND.name: Higher Ground

LIGHTNING_STRIKE.effect: Target any opposing unit. The target makes a save roll. If it does not generate a save result, it is killed. A unit may not be targeted by more than one Lightning Strike per magic action.
LIGHTNING_STRIKE.name: Lightning Strike

MAGIC_DRAIN.effect: Target any terrain. Subtract two magic results from all army rolls at that terrain until the beginning of your next turn.
MAGIC_DRAIN.name: Magic Drain

MIRAGE.effect: Target up to five health-worth of units at any terrain. The targets make a save roll. Those that do not generate a save result are moved to their Reserve Area.
MIRAGE.name: Mirage

MIRE.effect: Target any terrain. Until the beginning of your next turn, any army marching at that terrain must first make a maneuver roll. The marching player then selects health-worth of units up to the maneuver results generated by this first roll. The army uses only those units, and items they carry, for any rolls in the march for both the maneuver step and the action step.
MIRE.name: Mire

NECROMANTIC_WAVE.effect: Target any army. All units in the target army may count magic results as if they were melee or missile results until the beginning of your next turn.
NECROMANTIC_WAVE.name: Necromantic Wave

OPEN_GRAVE.effect: Target any army. Until the beginning of your next turn, units in the target army that are killed following a save roll by any army-targeting effects (including melee and missile damage) go to their owner's Reserve Area instead of the DUA. If no save roll is possible when units are killed, Open Grave does nothing.
OPEN_GRAVE.name: Open Grave

PALSY.effect: Target any opposing army. Subtract one result from the target's non-maneuver rolls until the beginning of your next turn.
PALSY.name: Palsy

PATH.effect: Target one of your units at a terrain. Move the target to any other terrain where you have an army.
PATH.name: Path

RALLY.effect: Target up to three of your Amazon units at a terrain. Move those units to any other terrain where you have at least one Amazon unit.
RALLY.name: Rally

RESTLESS_DEAD.effect: Target any army. Add three maneuver results to the target's rolls until the beginning of your next turn.
RESTLESS_DEAD.name: Restless Dead

RESURRECT_DEAD.effect: Target one health-worth of units in your DUA that contains the element of magic used to cast this spell. Return the targets to the casting army. Magic of any one element (or Ivory) may be used to resurrect Amazons. Multiple casting of this spell targeting a single unit must all use the same element of magic.
RESURRECT_DEAD.name: Resurrect Dead

RISE_OF_THE_ELDARIM.effect: Target any Eldarim unit that matches the element of magic used to cast this spell. The target is promoted one health-worth.
RISE_OF_THE_ELDARIM.name: Rise of the Eldarim

SCENT_OF_FEAR.effect: Target up to three health-worth of opposing units at any terrain. The target units are moved to their Reserve Area.
SCENT_OF_FEAR.name: Scent of Fear

SOILED_GROUND.effect: Target any terrain. Until the beginning of your next turn, any unit killed at that terrain that goes into the DUA must make a save roll. Those that do not generate a save result are buried.
SOILED_GROUND.name: Soiled Ground

STONE_SKIN.effect: Target any army. Add one save result to the target's rolls until the beginning of your next turn.
STONE_SKIN.name: Stone Skin

SUMMON_DRAGON.effect: Target any terrain. Summon one dragon that contains the element used to cast this spell from any Summoning Pool or terrain to the target terrain. Magic of any one element may be used to summon an Ivory or Ivory Hybrid Dragon from any Summoning Pool to the target terrain.
SUMMON_DRAGON.name: Summon Dragon

SUMMON_DRAGONKIN.effect: Target one health-worth of Dragonkin units in your Summoning Pool that match the element of magic used to cast this spell. The targets join the casting army.
SUMMON_DRAGONKIN.name: Summon Dragonkin

SUMMON_WHITE_DRAGON.effect: Target any terrain. Summon one White Dragon from any Summoning Pool or terrain to the target terrain. Any combination of magic elements may be used to cast this spell.
SUMMON_WHITE_DRAGON.name: Summon White Dragon

SWAMP_FEVER.effect: Target up to three health-worth of units in an opposing army. Roll the targets. If they roll an ID icon, they are killed. Any units killed by Swamp Fever make a second roll. If they roll an ID icon they are buried.
SWAMP_FEVER.name: Swamp Fever

TIDAL_WAVE.effect: Target any terrain. Each army at that terrain takes four points of damage, and makes a combination save and maneuver roll. For this special combination roll, only effects that generate normal save and maneuver results count. The terrain is reduced one step unless an army generates at least four maneuver results. A terrain may never be reduced by more than one step during a player's turn from the effects of Tidal Wave.
TIDAL_WAVE.name: Tidal Wave

TRANSMUTE_ROCK_TO_MUD.effect: Target any opposing army. Subtract six maneuver results from the target's rolls until the beginning of your next turn.
TRANSMUTE_ROCK_TO_MUD.name: Transmute Rock to Mud

WALL_OF_FOG.effect: Target any terrain. Subtract six missile results from any missile attack targeting an army at that terrain until the beginning of your next turn.
WALL_OF_FOG.name: Wall of Fog

WALL_OF_THORNS.effect: Target any terrain not at its eighth face. Any army that successfully maneuvers that terrain takes six points of damage. The army makes a melee roll instead of a save roll. Reduce the damage taken by the number of melee results generated. This effect lasts until the beginning of your next turn.
WALL_OF_THORNS.name: Wall of Thorns

WATERY_DOUBLE.effect: Target any army. Add one save result to the target's rolls until the beginning of your next turn.
WATERY_DOUBLE.name: Watery Double

WILDING.effect: Target any army. The target army may double the melee and save results of any one unit until the beginning of your next turn. Select the unit to double its results after the army makes each roll.
WILDING.name: Wilding

WIND_WALK.effect: Target any army. Add four maneuver results to the target's rolls until the beginning of your next turn.
WIND_WALK.name: Wind Walk
